effect.name: Chroma Key Color Inverted (Texture)
effect.description:
This shader keep the selected color causing the color to be visible but others color are invisible.
Last Updated: 2026-01-04 22:02
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Chroma Key Color Inverted (Texture) Shader | 1.0 (26.11.2025) */
parameter.description: This shader keep the selected color causing the color to be visible but others color are invisible.

parameter.name: Inverted Color Key
parameter.description: This variable specifies which color to keep.

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable is responsible for the visibility of the effect.
